Meteorite_Landings <- read_csv("Meteorite_Landings.csv")
Meteorite_Landings |> filter(year>=860 & year<=2016) |> filter(reclong<=180 & reclong>=-180 & (reclat!=0 | reclong!=0))
#filters out known invalid data values

View(Meteorite_Landings)
